translated: The Numerical Order of the Conditions, the Order of the Twos, etc.
The Chapter on the Fetters, etc. as Objective Domains🔽With a non-fester as condition, a fester arises …

original: Nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na saññojanam dhammam paṭicca saññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  na gantham dhammam paṭicca ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  na ogham dhammam paṭicca oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: With a non-bond as condition, a bond arises …🔽With a non-flood as condition, a flood arises …

original: Nayogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na yogam dhammam paṭicca yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: With a non-bondage as condition, a bondage arises …

original: Nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: With a non-hindrance as condition, a hindrance arises. (In brief.)

original: Naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca parāmāsaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: In the section on root cause, there are nine; … in the section on kamma result, there is one; … in the section on the unincluded, there are nine.🔽With a non-clinging as condition, a clinging arises. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: In the section on root cause, there are five; … in the section on kamma result, there is one; … in the section on the unincluded, there are five. (In brief.)
